item.title: my blog test
item.description: Intro This is a test where I am going to load a dataset with import() and explore it with glimpse() library(rio) social = import("data/adult_socialcare.csv") I can summarise my data with summarise library(tidyverse) social %>% group_by(year) %>% mutate_at(vars(adult_sc), funs(as.numeric)) %>% summarise(min =min(adult_sc), max = max(adult_sc)) %>% filter(!is.na(min)) %>% ggplot(., aes(year, min)) + geom_bar(stat = "identity")
